FuncDef: The display interface eth-trunk forwarding-table command displays the forwarding table of an Eth-Trunk interface. The display interface eth-trunk forwarding-table command displays the forwarding table of an Eth-Trunk interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interface name.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the type of an interface.
The interface type must be Eth-Trunk.

Specifies the number of an interface.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 1023.

ExtraInfo: After an Eth-Trunk interface is successfully configured, you can run this command to view the forwarding table of the Eth-Trunk interface and the status of member interfaces of the Eth-Trunk interface. When the weight is configured, multiple copies of the same interface are displayed.
